0: This policy will copy a secret called `postgres-superuser` which exists in the `database` namespace to new namespaces when they are created. It will also push updates to the copied Secrets should the source secret be changed.
Add the postgres init-db init container to the pod.

mkdir -p /opt/scrutiny/config &&
cat << EOF > /opt/scrutiny/config/collector.yaml
---
# config piped from lifecycle.postStart script
version: 1
host:
  id: "$${NODE_NAME}"
api:
  endpoint: "$${COLLECTOR_API_ENDPOINT}"
EOF
